ygData.subject: RE: evil in the light elf realm
ygData.msgSnippet: You should be able to get off at the dock ok since the npc that meets the boat is indifferent to all races/classes.  If that makes you nervous though, jump off
ygData.messageBody:
You should be able to get off at the dock ok since the npc that meets the
boat is indifferent to all races/classes. If that makes you nervous though,
jump off the boat after you set sail from the bb docks just on the other
side of the wall which is a much shorter journey to unrest than jumping off
the boat before the docks.

You'll need to watch out for dwarf guards and you should be able to sell to
a druid that is kinda on the way to unrest if you jump off the boat after is
leaves port. Just con the druid prior to selling.



-----Original Message-----
From: Trizzen Do'Trevan [mailto:trizzen@...]
Sent: Wednesday, September 22, 1999 9:59 AM
To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] evil in the light elf realm


From: Trizzen Do'Trevan <trizzen@...>

Myself and my three troll friends are thinking of
making a trip to Unrest. However, none of us have ever
been to that continent as evil players. Could you all
please give some hints on how to get my warrior type
friends safely past bb? Also, is there anyplace there
that we can sell? Or buy food for that matter. :)

Thank you!

Darkmoon 16th circle


This list is basically unmoderated. However abusive language will not be
tolerated
